description: a(0) = 0; for n > 0, if the value of n itself appears in the sequence then a(n) = a(n-1) - (n-index(n)) if nonnegative and not already in the sequence, otherwise a(n) = a(n-1) + (n-index(n)), where index(n) is the index of the last appearance of n. If the value of n does not appear then a(n) = a(n-1) - n if nonnegative and not already in the sequence, otherwise a(n) = a(n-1) + n.
